item.title: We are looking for a Sales and Lead generator (UK / US timezone) - Upwork
item.description:
Rewards Bag power rewards marketing – the hottest global topic for customer engagement and retention.

We are the leading company in this emerging market – our multinational offering connects Brand Partners with our network of Rewards Publishers.

We live and breathe the world of advertising, yet we work in the world of loyalty and retention. And it’s that combination that gives us our edge: connecting brands with publishers to create happy customers.

Are you a committed, target driven and collaborative salesperson brimming with new ideas? Do you have a passion to succeed in a fast paced, friendly and lively environment? Do you find the world of rewards and loyalty to be exciting and full of potential?
If so, you have come to the right place!

The Role
As a lead generator your main responsibilities are to build lists of potential new reward publishers that are suitable for our new tech platform and contact those potential customers with tailored and personalised pitches that we provide.

Upon a relevant lead engaging, you will then pass these leads to your sales manager who will then complete the sales process.

• Sending personalised pitches to customers across varying sectors
• Updating our internal CRM (Hubspot) with customer info and outreaches - Keeping this maintained.
• Following up with leads via email and Linkedin
• Booking sales calls
• Ensuring service is prompt, polite and professional standards are kept.
• To act as an ambassador for the business, and promote our new tech platform.
• To achieve agreed personal and departmental meeting targets
• Attending weekly/bi-weekly calls with your manager

Skills Required:
• Perfect written and verbal English
• Confident communication skills
• A positive approach to objection handling is essential
• Excellent organisational skills and attention to detail
• Hubspot knowledge experience

What you need:
• A quiet room to work in
• A working PC or laptop with strong internet connection



Posted On: July 30, 2024 09:37 UTC
Category: Lead Generation
Skills:Sales, Sales Management, Sales Development, Competitive Analysis, Lead Generation, List Building, Outbound Sales, Prospect List, Scheduling, Microsoft Excel
Skills: Sales, Sales Management, Sales Development, Competitive Analysis, Lead Generation, List Building, Outbound Sales, Prospect List, Scheduling, Microsoft Excel
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Automation Expert - Upwork
item.description:
RDS Accounting is seeking a highly skilled Automation Expert to join our team remotely. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in automating processes using various software systems, including Tally, Zoho, Odoo, Microsoft tools, and Google tools. Additionally, the candidate should possess strong knowledge of Python, JavaScript, AI, and system integrations using APIs.

Key Responsibilities:
Process Automation: Design, develop, and implement automated workflows and processes using Tally, Zoho, Odoo, Microsoft tools (Excel, Power BI, etc.), and Google tools (Sheets, Drive, etc.).
System Integration: Integrate various software systems and tools using APIs to ensure seamless data flow and communication between platforms.
Scripting and Development: Write scripts and develop custom solutions using Python and JavaScript to automate repetitive tasks and enhance system functionalities.
Artificial Intelligence: Leverage AI and machine learning technologies to create intelligent automation solutions that can adapt and improve over time.
Optimization: Continuously monitor and optimize automated processes to improve efficiency, accuracy, and performance.
Technical Support: Provide technical support and training to team members on the use of automated systems and tools.
Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of automated processes, integrations, and custom scripts for future reference and troubleshooting.
Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including IT, operations, and business units, to identify automation opportunities and implement effective solutions.
Technical Skills:
Proficiency in automation using Microsoft tools (Excel, Power BI), and Google tools (Sheets, Drive).
Strong knowledge of Python and JavaScript.
Experience with AI and machine learning technologies.
Expertise in system integrations using APIs.

Preferred Qualifications:
Experience: Previous experience in a similar role . Knowledge of customization of Zoho/Tally/Odoo systems would be an added advantage.


Posted On: July 30, 2024 09:29 UTC
Category: Scripting & Automation
Skills:Python, JavaScript, Automated Testing, API, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Power BI
Skills: Python, JavaScript, Automated Testing, API, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Power BI
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: Power Platform Senior Developer - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a Power Platform  Senior Developer be part of our partner Low Code Factory. The candidate will be dedicated to the governance of the Power Platform for the company, validating new connectors and Development of applications in Power Apps and workflows with Power Automate.

Main Tasks & Responsibilities:
• The candidate will work on the Porto branch inside the Power Platform factory, on the development of application with the Power Platform.
• It will be responsible for the business analyze and the delivery of applications.
• Help the team find new opportunities

Requirements
Main Technical Requirements:

• Proved knowledge on Power Apps and Power Automate
• Already have developed custom connectors.
• Knowledge on PowerShell (is a plus)
• Knowledge on Power BI (is a plus)
• Knowledge on Power Virtual Agents or AI Builder (is a plus)
• Knowledge on CSS, HTML, JSON (is a plus)

Years of Experience:
• 2Y+ on the development of Power Apps and Power Automate
• 1Y+ on a major programming language (Python/C / Java/ SQL/ JavaScript/.Net…)
• 1Y+ on SharePoint Online
• 4Y+ on SharePoint 2013/2016/Online (is a plus)

Other Requirements:
• English (B1 minimum)
• French (is a plus) â€‹

This position is based in Porto, Portugal. It´s a hybrid model, 8 visits per week in the office


Posted On: July 30, 2024 08:42 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development

Skills: Microsoft Power Automate

item.title: Power BI Developer - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Power BI Developer to join our dynamic team. The
ideal candidate will have 5-6 years of hands-on experience in Power BI, with a strong background in

data modelling and report development. The candidate should also have expertise in DAX and M-
language to effectively transform and present data in meaningful ways.

Responsibilities:
1. Develop, design, and maintain Power BI dashboards and reports.
2. Write and optimize DAX (Data Analysis Expressions) to create measures and calculated
columns.
3. Analyse existing reports from Tableau or SSRS reporting system and transform them into
Power BI.
4. Utilize M-language for advanced data transformations in Power BI.
5. Perform data analysis and provide insights to support decision-making processes.
6. Ensure data accuracy and consistency across various reports and dashboards.
7. Implement best practices for Power BI development and data visualization.
8. Working knowledge on Shared Data Model (Semantic Model) and Incremental Data Refresh
9. Perform Unit testing as part of Development process.
10. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Power BI reports and data sources.
11. Provide training and support to end-users on Power BI functionalities and best practices.

JD/Power BI Developer/2022/DA-0701

Nice to Have:

Knowledge on Tableau Model and Development
Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies.

Qualifications, Skills and Experience:
• Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Systems, or a related field.
• 5-6 years of experience in Power BI development, including data modelling and report
creation.
• Proficiency in DAX and M-language.
• Strong understanding of data visualization principles and best practices.
• Experience with SQL and database management.
• Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
• Strong communication skills to interact with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
• Attention to detail and a commitment to quality.

Hourly Range: $10.00
Posted On: July 30, 2024 07:54 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, SQL
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, SQL
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Power BI and SQL Expert for Azure Data Factory Integration - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented Power BI and SQL expert with experience in Azure Data Factory to help integrate our data sources into a unified platform. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of Power BI, SQL, and Azure Data Factory and will be able to design and implement efficient workflows for data extraction, transformation, and loading.

Responsibilities:
- Develop Power BI reports and dashboards based on business requirements
- Design and implement data extraction, transformation, and loading processes using Azure Data Factory
- Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze data requirements
- Optimize data models and queries for performance

Requirements:
- Proficiency in Power BI, SQL, and Azure Data Factory
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Experience with data modeling and database design
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills

This is a medium-sized project with an estimated duration of 3 to 6 months. We are looking for an expert-level professional who can hit the ground running and deliver high-quality results within the specified timeframe.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: July 30, 2024 02:54 UTC
Category: Data Engineering
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Azure SQL Database, SQL, Microsoft Azure
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Azure SQL Database, SQL, Microsoft Azure
Country: India

item.title: Power BI Dashboard Expert - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented Power BI expert to develop an interactive dashboard for our business. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in data analysis and visualization, with extensive experience in creating visually appealing and user-friendly dashboards using Power BI. The dashboard should provide real-time insights and enable users to make data-driven decisions.

    Responsibilities:
    - Gather requirements from stakeholders and understand their data needs
    - Design and develop visually appealing dashboards using Power BI
    - Implement data models and create interactive visualizations
    - Optimize dashboard performance and ensure data accuracy
    - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment with business goals

    Requirements:
    - Proven experience in developing Power BI dashboards
    - Strong data analysis and visualization skills
    - Proficiency in DAX, M, and Power Query
    - Familiarity with SQL and data manipulation techniques
    - Excellent problem-solving and communication skills

    If you are passionate about data visualization and have a knack for turning complex data into actionable insights, we would love to hear from you. This is a great opportunity to showcase your expertise and make a significant impact on our business.

    Please include samples of your previous Power BI dashboard projects in your proposal.


Posted On: July 29, 2024 21:53 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Business Intelligence
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Business Intelligence
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Senior Power BI Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Key Requirements for a Senior Power BI Developer
Minimum 4 years of hands-on experience in Power BI development, dashboarding, data modeling and visualization techniques
Experienced in data integration through extracting, transforming, and loading (ETL) data from various sources (SQL, Cloud, other)
Experienced with complex visuals, DAX
Knowledge of Power Query, DAX, SQL, Paginated Report, Azure
Strong analytical, interpersonal & communication skills
Strong leadership skills and ability to share knowledge
English language proficiency is a must, both verbal and written
Responsibilities of a Senior Power BI Developer
Be a leader of the entire solution implementation process from analysis, collecting customer requirements to design and development of reports and dashboards
Designing and implementing complex solutions leveraging Microsoft Power BI, Power Platform and Azure
Implementing complex DAX measures in Analysis services models and in Power BI
Drawing conclusions and recommendations - including expected benefits and measuring ROI for enhancing business processes – presenting them to Customers
Sharing experience and best practices with peers and more junior team members
Pre-sales activities, scoping projects before they start

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: July 30, 2024 00:33 UTC
Category: Data Visualization

item.content:encoded:
Key Requirements for a Senior Power BI Developer
Minimum 4 years of hands-on experience in Power BI development, dashboarding, data modeling and visualization techniques
Experienced in data integration through extracting, transforming, and loading (ETL) data from various sources (SQL, Cloud, other)
Experienced with complex visuals, DAX
Knowledge of Power Query, DAX, SQL, Paginated Report, Azure
Strong analytical, interpersonal & communication skills
Strong leadership skills and ability to share knowledge
English language proficiency is a must, both verbal and written
Responsibilities of a Senior Power BI Developer
Be a leader of the entire solution implementation process from analysis, collecting customer requirements to design and development of reports and dashboards
Designing and implementing complex solutions leveraging Microsoft Power BI, Power Platform and Azure
Implementing complex DAX measures in Analysis services models and in Power BI
Drawing conclusions and recommendations - including expected benefits and measuring ROI for enhancing business processes – presenting them to Customers
Sharing experience and best practices with peers and more junior team members
Pre-sales activities, scoping projects before they start

item.title: Part-Time (As-needed) Technical Support Specialist for AppSheets and Power BI - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Technical Support Specialist to join our team on a part-time basis (as needed). The primary responsibility will be creating and managing forms in AppSheets, ensuring data validity, and generating reports using Power BI.

Key Responsibilities:
• Create and maintain forms in AppSheets, including those with complex logic.
• Ensure data validity and communicate with field personnel to resolve any data validation issues.
• Generate comprehensive reports in Power BI utilizing the collected data.
• Collaborate with team members to understand and implement requirements.

Qualifications:
• Minimum of two years of experience with AppSheets and Power BI (or similar)
• Strong understanding of data validation and complex form logic.
• Excellent communication skills for interacting with field personnel and team members.
• Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.
Preferred Skills:
• Experience in troubleshooting and providing technical support.
• Familiarity with integrating AppSheets with other data sources.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

Working Conditions:
• Part-time position with flexible hours. Must be able to work during EST hours at least part of the working day
• Remote work with potential occasional meetings.
• Must be able to communicate in English

If you have a passion for technology and a knack for solving problems, we would love to hear from you. Please apply with your resume and a brief cover letter outlining your experience with AppSheets and Power BI.


Hourly Range: $16.00-$50.00

item.title: Generate Office Data Connection(ODC) to load aggregated metrics inside an Excel Pivot Table - Upwork
item.description:
We are trying to generate an Office Data Connection(ODC) file that loads aggregated metrics into an Excel Pivot Table.

ODC file contains MSOLAP as the "Provider" and CUBE as the "command" indicating the need to build a multidimensional model. We would also need to deploy the model to a virtual machine that runs SQL Server Analytics Services(prod) for aggregating business metrics.

Deliverable: We would like someone to walk us through how to generate a valid ODC file and produce the ODC file that can be run inside Excel on any computer without needing passwords/credentials.

Skills needed: Azure VM, Azure IAM, Azure SQL Server, Microsoft SQL Server, SQL Server Analysis Services, Microsoft Excel

The attached file shows roughly what the architecture should look like except instead of using Power BI, we'll use Excel to load the aggregated business metrics inside a Pivot table.

WE NEED TO GET THIS DONE ASAP SO PLEASE SHARE YOUR AVAILABILITY WHEN RESPONDING TO THIS POST!!!!!!

Hourly Range: $35.00-$100.00
Posted On: July 29, 2024 22:57 UTC
Category: DevOps Engineering
Skills:Microsoft Azure, Microsoft Windows, Business with 1-9 Employees, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft Visual Studio
Skills: Microsoft Azure, Microsoft Windows, Business with 1-9 Employees, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft Visual Studio

item.title: Write new questions for a Power BI test - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there,

We're TestGorilla, a fast-growing HR tech startup that helps hiring teams make better hiring decisions faster and bias-free.

Over the past year, we’ve experienced tremendous growth. More than 10,000 companies have replaced CVs with our assessments to screen candidates in an unbiased and data-driven way.

As we scale our efforts in 2024 and beyond, we’re looking for an expert in Power BI  to collaborate with us in creating a test to evaluate candidates who apply to positions that need good knowledge of Power BI skills.

**What's in for you?**
- Build your reputation: We share information about you with thousands of our customers, which is a good opportunity to showcase your skills and expertise in your field. (If you prefer not to have your name shown, we can do that, too).

- Receive expert coaching: This will be a rewarding and collaborative process. We'll be providing guidance and feedback throughout the project at predetermined intervals. In the end, we will also conduct a technical review with a third-party expert.

**What is this job about?**
You will:
- Create 26 new questions to add to the existing test.
- Review and edit 27 existing questions that need to be improved.

You will also be asked to provide difficulty ratings on a scale of 1-100 for each question you work on.

All questions submitted must be your own, original work. All material is checked for originality and copyright issues.

The project usually takes around 3-5 weeks (though it's not a full-time project), and weekly deliverables are expected. The project can move faster than proposed if you have the time availability.

**Who are we looking for?**
You should:
- Be a deep subject-matter expert in Power BI with extensive experience in the field and a proven track record of creating appropriate material.
- Have strong English writing skills since this project involves much writing that must be clear and precise.

Experience as an instructor/coach in this area is preferred but not required.

If you are interested, please get in touch and answer our screening questions.

Budget: $550
Posted On: July 29, 2024 21:17 UTC
Category: Technical Writing
Skills:Technical Writing, Microsoft Power BI, Business Intelligence
Skills: Technical Writing, Microsoft Power BI, Business Intelligence
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: BI Specialist for dashboards - Upwork
item.description:
We are an established educational services provider seeking a skilled Business Intelligence (BI) specialist to set up clear and actionable reporting dashboards for our organization.
Project Description:
Design and implement a series of BI dashboards using Tableau or a similar tool. The goal is to create a comprehensive reporting system that provides clear insights into our key performance indicators (KPIs) across various departments, including admissions, program performance, marketing effectiveness, and financial metrics.
Key Responsibilities:

Assess our current data sources and reporting needs
Design intuitive and informative dashboard layouts
Implement dashboards using Tableau or a similar BI tool
Set up data connections and ensure data accuracy
Create interactive visualizations for key metrics
Implement drill-down capabilities for detailed analysis
Ensure dashboards are user-friendly for non-technical staff
Provide documentation and basic training for dashboard usage

Requirements:

Proven experience in BI dashboard implementation, preferably in the education sector
Expert-level proficiency in Tableau or a similar BI tool
Strong data analysis and visualization skills
Experience with data modeling and ETL processes
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills
Ability to translate complex data into actionable insights

Deliverables:

A set of interactive BI dashboards covering key areas of our business
Documentation of data sources and calculation methodologies
User guide for navigating and utilizing the dashboards

To Apply:
Please submit your proposal including:

Your relevant experience in BI dashboard implementation
Examples of dashboards you've created (with screenshots if possible)

Hourly Range: $35.00-$75.00
Posted On: July 29, 2024 18:22 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Data Analysis, Business Intelligence, Tableau
Skills: Data Analysis, Business Intelligence, Tableau
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

the current status of a certain candidate

item.title: eLearning Power BI Course Developer - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced eLearning professional to develop a comprehensive Power BI course for our 400+ internal staff, ranging from financial analysts to operations managers. The course should cover all essential concepts, techniques, and best practices required to develop basic reports and dashboards in Power BI using our standardized Datamart/semantic model.

Project Overview
Duration: 1 month
Deliverable: SCORM 1.2-compliant eLearning course
Course length: 60 minutes, divided into modules
Target audience: Beginner to intermediate Power BI users

Responsibilities
• Develop a 60-minute Power BI eLearning course using Articulate Storyline
• Instruct users on how to set up Power BI & access the company Datamart
• Explain Power BI best practices in building visualizations, with a focus on our company's design guidelines
• Guide users on building useful and impactful reports using the Datamart & Power BI
• Create interactive exercises and assessments to reinforce learning
• Collaborate with our subject matter experts for content review and approval

Course Content
The course should cover:
• Power BI Desktop basics
• Connecting to our Datamart
• Data modeling and relationships
• Creating visualizations (charts, tables, maps)
• Building interactive dashboards
• Sharing and collaborating on reports

Requirements
• Proven experience as an eLearning developer with a strong portfolio of impactful courses
• Proficiency in Articulate Storyline
• Experience with Power BI and building reports and dashboards
• Availability to commit to a 1 month project
• Excellent communication skills for collaboration with our team
• Familiarity with SCORM and xAPI standards

Preferred Qualifications
• Certified in eLearning development (e.g., ATD, Learning Guild)
• Microsoft Certified: Data Analyst Associate or similar Power BI certification


Hourly Range: $20.00-$50.00
Posted On: July 29, 2024 17:35 UTC
Category: Training & Development
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Elearning, Articulate Storyline
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Elearning, Articulate Storyline
Country: United States
click to apply

As a Power BI Developer, you will be responsible for data modeling and should possess a good understanding of data structures. If you have a passion for data analytics and are experienced in Power BI development, we would love to hear from you.

Relevant Skills:
- Power BI
- Microsoft Excel

- Troubleshooting

item.title: AR Reconciliation Team Lead - Upwork
item.description:
What this role is: You will be working with the various teams of the company (accounting, procurement, etc.) to reconcile monthly supplier bills and credits, and to identify and close the gaps of transactional based loss and inefficiencies. This role will report in directly to the VP of Finance and Accounting and lead a team of 1-3 international contractors in the receivables group.

Your role will include:

- Monthly reconciliation of supplier invoices and credit memos to ensure accurate amounts charged to the company as well as credited for returned goods.
- Data analysis of reporting, including from PowerBI, including recommendations on improvements to existing reporting in order to have it achieve the goals of the reports.
- Outreach to the company's 100+ suppliers to follow up on bills not yet received, credit memos that need to be issued to the company, etc.
- Coordination with the receivables team to properly format billing data received from the company's suppliers for upload to the company's data warehouse, with the ultimate goal of it providing accurate data for our PowerBI reporting, and troubleshooting issues related to this data.
- Tracking of issues related to individual customer orders that lead to losses for the company, such as credits not received on a timely basis from the company's suppliers, freight charges coming in higher than expected, losses in transit, etc.
Reporting on recovered losses and unrecoverable losses.
- Identifying and tracking the monthly payables to be paid by cash monthly on the 10th of the month by the VP of Finance to our list of vendors paid by bank wire.
- Ad hoc projects may come up, such as involving the company's warehouse data, etc.
- Training and leading the team of reconciliation contractors, helping them to manage their time and progress and execute the work with accuracy.

Your background:

- E-commerce or large commerce business background is preferred, specifically experience with high-transaction volume businesses. We want a weathered lead who has improved outdated and/or inefficient processes, solved these problems and created controls in the past.
- Accounts receivable, data analysis, or similar competency/emphasis with at least 5-7 yrs of related experience
- Advanced Microsoft Excel skills including pivot/power pivot, H and V lookup, sumif, etc. and create/maintain accurate financial datasets
- Exceptional analytical and problem solving skills
- Excellent communication skills, as this role will necessitate extensive communication over email and phone with the company's suppliers and multiple departments within the company
- Organized self-starter who thrives in high growth environments
- Ability to clearly present (verbal and written) data and findings to company leadership
- Experience with PowerBI reporting a plus
- Fluency in English

The job is generally Monday-Friday, 9AM EST-5PM EST. Overtime and/or weekend work may be required at times.

Hourly Range: $15.00
Posted On: July 29, 2024 16:46 UTC
Category: Accounting
Skills:Account Reconciliation, Bank Reconciliation, Month-End Close Assistance, Accounts Receivable, Accounts Receivable Management, Accounts Payable, Microsoft Excel, Accounting, Microsoft Power BI, Training
Skills: Account Reconciliation, Bank Reconciliation, Month-End Close Assistance, Accounts Receivable, Accounts Receivable Management, Accounts Payable, Microsoft Excel, Accounting, Microsoft Power BI, Training
Country: United States

item.title: PowerBI/ Tableau Project - Upwork
item.description:
I wanted to let you know that time has come to test your Business Intelligence and Data Visualization skills to test by working on a Mini Project. This project aims to enhance your analytical acumen by helping you understand/interpret complex data and deliver top notch insights.

The task is very simple - All the students need to individually find a data (maybe publically available), analyse it using Tableau or Power BI and deliver a detailed Project Report talking about the analysis, findings, conclusions and recommendations (as shown sample during lectures). Below mentioned are the documents required from all the students:

Dataset(s) used for analysis [mandatory]
Tableau Prep. files for data cleaning and merging [optional]
Tableau Desktop File (.twbx) / Power BI Dashboard (.pbix) for visualization and you should create dashboards and stories [mandatory]
Project Report (Business problem, explain the story, data, your findings and conclusion, and recommendation)(pdf) [mandatory]
Python code used for data cleaning and merging [optional]
Poster for first page of Project Report [optional]

Deadline is in 6hrs

Budget: $60
Posted On: July 29, 2024 16:37 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Tableau, Data Modeling, Data Analysis, Data Visualization
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Tableau, Data Modeling, Data Analysis, Data Visualization
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Extracting features from audio music samples using Deep Learning  - Upwork
item.description:
Hello, I am doing an academic project in which we have to extract some features (e.g. pitch) from an audio music samples. This is to be done by developing a Deep Learning Convolution Neural Network. Need help in doing this project. If you are interested please do let me know. Thank you. Ashok Dhingra, Pune.
